actions: Invigorates the Blood, circulates Qi, stops pain and disperses extravasation.

Warms the Kidneys, Spleen and Heart, strengthens Yang and Ming Men Fire, disperses deep Cold, warms the channels, unblocks the channels and vessels, alleviates pain and assists in the generation of Qi and Blood.
Tonifies the Kidneys and Liver, tonifies Kidney Yang,strengthens the sinews and bones and aids the smooth flow of Qi and Blood.
Expels Wind-Cold-Dampness, unblocks painful obstruction, alleviates pain and guides Qi to the Tai Yang and Du channels.
Tonifies Kidney Yin and astringes Jing.

symptoms: Lower back pain that is fixed, stabbing and /or severe
In severe cases, movement is difficult and very painful with restricted range of motion
The pain may be worse in the evening and is unaffected by weather or temperature
Blue, dark or purplish discoloration of skin in small or large areas
Tendency to hemorrhage dark blood or clots
manifestations.tongue: Purple, possible purple or red spots Red purple if there is Heat Blue purple if there is Cold
